title: Encore: Share and Share Alike
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Glynn Washington (Snap Judgment) and Tiffany Boone (Hunters, Nine Perfect Strangers) star in this favorite folktale from season one, about a lazy bear who isn't big on sharing, until he meets a clever rabbit.
itunes:author: WBUR
